Hometown: Southampton, UK

Current-location: Shibuya, Tokyo

----

Description: 

I make music ([soundcloud](http://soundcloud.com/dabby)) and mess around in Unity3D and blender.

I love making games, designing stuff and development. I also love music, dj'ing and karaoke.

I like to cook - my speciality is Indian curry. Try my Jalfrezi one day, it's pretty good!

----
